SELECT A.*, B.ACT_PATH FROM TBL_MENU A LEFT OUTER JOIN TBL_ACTION B ON A.ACT_ID = B.ACT_ID WHERE PRNT_ID = #{value} AND STATUS <> '999' ORDER BY SRT_ORD, MENU_ID
mapper.insert:
SELECT LPAD(IFNULL(CAST(MAX(MENU_ID) AS UNSIGNED) + 1, 1), 5, '0') NEW_ID FROM TBL_MENU
INSERT INTO TBL_MENU ( MENU_ID, MENU_NAME, ACT_ID, IMG_CFG, PRNT_ID, SRT_ORD, UPD_ID, UPD_TIME, STATUS ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{actionID}, #{imageConfig}, #{parentID}, 99999, #{modifiedBy}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{status} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_MENU SET MENU_NAME = #{name}, ACT_ID = #{actionID}, IMG_CFG = #{imageConfig}, UPD_ID = #{modifiedBy}, UPD_TIME = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE MENU_ID = #{id}
UPDATE TBL_MENU SET SRT_ORD = CASE MENU_ID WHEN #{menuID} THEN #{index} ELSE 99999 END WHERE MENU_ID IN (#{menuID}) AND PRNT_ID = #{parentID}
UPDATE TBL_MENU SET STATUS = #{status}, UPD_ID = #{modifiedBy}, UPD_TIME = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE MENU_ID IN (#{menuID}) AND STATUS <> #{status}
